titleStmt.title: Anno tertio Henrici Octavi The kynge our soueraygne lorde Henry the eyght ...
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England.

notesStmt.note: Title from Beale; no complete copy seen.
Printer's name from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Contains years 3-7. Years 4-6 each have separate title page; register is continuous. Each title page has border with Greek key design (McKerrow & Ferguson 26).
Item at reel 419:19 identified as STC 9362+++.
Imperfect: item at reel 419:19 is "Anno quinto" only.
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Harvard University Library.
